item.title: CVE-2019-5456|2024-08-04T19:54:53.544Z -- unifi -- unifi
item.description: SMTP MITM refers to a malicious actor setting up an SMTP proxy server between the UniFi Controller version <= 5.10.21 and their actual SMTP server to record their SMTP credentials for malicious use later.
